main_menu.select_language_answer: You have set the language to {language}. To start using the bot, press 'Continue'
main_menu.start_message:
üéÖ Ho-ho-ho! Welcome to Secret Santa!

Create a cozy room for your friends üéÅ
 or join an existing one and join the fun! ‚ú®
main_menu.menu_reminder: ‚ùó Don't forget to update your contact information in the profile. üéÅ Without address and phone number, Santa won't be able to send you a gift.
main_menu.about_message: Secret Santa is a festive game held before New Year or Christmas among friends, colleagues, or family üéÑ üéÅ You can: ‚Äî create your own room and invite friends ‚Äî or join an existing one After the game starts, each participant is randomly assigned a recipient. You become a Secret Santa for one of the players and prepare a gift for them anonymously ‚ú® üì¶ The gift is sent to the address provided in the profile. After receiving the gifts, players can reveal their secret identities and share impressions. ü§ù The bot is completely free. ‚ö†Ô∏è Restrictions: One user can own no more than {room_user_rooms_count} rooms. ‚úâÔ∏è If you have questions or errors ‚Äî contact @{support_account}

main_menu.menu_message: The data you provide is necessary for your Secret Santa to send you a gift. Your profile: {user_information} To ensure security, we encrypt the address and phone number in the database. If you want to change or delete your personal data, press Edit Profile
main_menu.profile_edit_message: Choose what you want to change:

change_address.change_address_first_msg: For Secret Santa to send you a gift 🎁, provide the full delivery address. Be sure to include: ‚Äî Country ‚Äî Region ‚Äî City ‚Äî Street ‚Äî House ‚Äî Apartment ‚Äî Floor* ‚Äî Intercom number, if different from apartment ‚Äî Postal code Example: Russia, Moscow region, Fryazino, Pupkina st., 99, apt. 999, floor 25, postal code 123987.
change_address.error: Address data cannot exceed 150 characters. Try again.

change_name.change_name_first_msg: Hohoho, it's time to provide your details for Santa 🎅 Keep in mind it will be used to send a gift by Santa. First, write your first name
change_name.change_name_third_msg: First name and last name changed.

change_number.change_number_first_msg: Provide your phone number so that postal services can notify you about the gift. Enter your number using the format: +7|8(___)___-__-__ For example: +7 700 111 11 11
change_number.error: ‚ùåInvalid phone format‚ùå You entered: {text}, try again. Try again using format: +7 or 8 (XXX) XXX-XX-XX Example: +7 700 111 11 11

delete_information.delete_information_first_msg: ‚ö†Ô∏è Tap confirm if you really want to delete all your personal data.
delete_information.delete_information_second_msg: All your data has been deleted.
delete_information.cancel_message: You entered the wrong command. Try again. To confirm, enter the word "confirm"

main.text_control_room_not_scheduler: The draw time has not yet been set.
main.text_control_room_scheduler: 🕓 The game in the current room is scheduled for {next_time_run}
main.room_closed_uns: The game in room {room_number} has ended! Unfortunately, the number of players was insufficient for a full draw.
main.room_closed_uns_for_own: To reactivate the room, click Activate Room, invite more people, and set a new draw time.
main.room_closed_suc: The game in your room has ended! You became Secret Santa for: {user_information} You can send a message to your Secret Santa, or send a message to your recipient.

change_budget.long_budget:
Message too long ‚ùå

Budget cannot exceed 16 characters.
Please send a new value.
change_budget.change_budget_first_msg:
Specify a new budget for the players in your room for the Secret Santa gift.
Write the amount in any format, for example, 2000 tenge, 200 rubles, or $20

The message length should not exceed 16 characters.
change_budget.change_budget_second_msg: The budget for room {room_number} has been updated. New value: {new_budget}

change_owner.error: This participant cannot be appointed as the room owner.
change_owner.change_owner_room_first_msg: Do you want to transfer room ownership? ‚ö†Ô∏è The new owner must be a participant of this room. ‚ö†Ô∏è After the transfer, you will lose control of the room. To continue, type the new owner's nickname.
change_owner.change_owner_room_second_msg: Ho-ho-ho! 🎅 I changed the owner, now it's {new_owner}

create_new_room.limit: A new room cannot be created, as you have reached the limit. You can own up to {maximal_count_rooms} rooms.
create_new_room.long_room_name:
You entered a name that is too long, please come up with another one.
The room name must not exceed 16 characters.
create_new_room.long_budget:
Message too long ‚ùå

Budget cannot exceed 16 characters.
Please send a new value.
create_new_room.create_new_room_first_msg:
Ho-ho-ho! 🎅

Let's create a new room 🎁
Type the name of your room.

‚ö†Ô∏è Room name should not exceed 16 characters.
create_new_room.create_new_room_second_msg: Great! üéÑ Room name: {room_name} Now set the maximum gift budget üéÅ Type the amount in any format: for example 2000 KZT, 200 RUB or 20$ ‚ö†Ô∏è Message must not exceed 16 characters.
create_new_room.create_new_room_third_msg:
Almost ready ‚ú®

Write your gift wishes.
Maybe you have a hobby or an idea of what you would like to receive üéÅ
create_new_room.create_new_room_forth_msg: Ho-ho-ho! 🎅 The room "{room_name}" has been created. Here is the room number {room_number} Share this code with your friends so they can join your game.
create_new_room.create_new_room_additional_msg: In the meantime, you can go back and update your profile.
create_new_room.join_room_url:
Or share this link with friends to join the room:

{url}

delete_room.delete_room_first_msg: ‚ùåThe room will be deleted without the possibility of recovery. To confirm the deletion of room {room_number}, enter confirm in the chat.
delete_room.delete_room_second_msg:
The room has been successfully deleted

 You can create a new room in the main menu.
delete_room.error_command_verif: You entered the wrong command for confirmation. To confirm the deletion of room {room_number}, enter confirm in the chat.
delete_room.error: Something went wrong, the room was not deleted.

subscribe.already_joined: You are already in this room.

subscribe.subscribe_third_msg: Ho-ho-ho! 🎅 You joined the room: {room_number}. Now you can play with your friends. Stay tuned for announcements from the room owner. Have a great game! 😋
subscribe.room_invitation: 🎅 Ho-ho-ho! You‚Äôve been invited to the Secret Santa room: {room_name} ({room_id}) 🎁 Click Enter, share your gift wishes, and join the holiday fun! ‚ú®
subscribe.invited_from_room_menu: Join the room to play Secret Santa 🎅 {room_url}

unsubscribe.unsubscribe_second_msg: You can return to the room at any time by using room number {room_number}.

result_mailing.message_text: You received this message because the mailing for your room [{room_name}] was set for this date. Unfortunately, there are not enough active players in your room. There should be 3 or more active players. Invite more players and set a new draw date
